item.title: Social Media Content Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We need a social media video editor who is a self-starter, an independent worker, and a direction follower with a marketing eye who can self-direct where to make cuts from larger long-form videos to create multiple shorter projects that make sense and are maximally impactful.

Work must be done by deadline and consistently goo quality.

The ideal candidate is astutely aware of trends and the importance of brand presence. It is vital that we capture attention, but not at the cost of our brand integrity.

Please be prepared to do a sample project for us and come with recommendations and samples of your work.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 22:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, TikTok Video, YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Social Video Enhancement, Video Editing, Social Media Content, Social Media Marketing, Content Strategy

item.title: Video Editing Expert - YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a talented video editor with a passion for creating compelling content? We are looking for a professional with experience in producing high-quality, long videos (20 minutes and more).

Requirements:
- Experience editing top-quality long-form videos. (20minute+)
- Proficiency in implementing smooth transitions and relevant animations.

- Originality is a must; avoid content from other cashcow channels.

- Commitment to producing 7-14 videos per week.
- Able to produce engaging documentaries for our YouTube channel.
- Proven track record of high view retention.

References: (please add to proposal!!)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_lUiTPn8kHs
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z1I1aqOs3wU
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vTdH1TsO57Q


Our rate per minute ranges between - $2.00 - $5.00

Join our team and bring our vision to life by producing visually appealing and engaging content. Send your portfolio. We look forward to your creative contribution! 🌟

Budget: $100

item.title: Meraki Firewall Pen Test Offer Explainer Video - Upwork
item.description:
Hi-
Please take a look at this page:
https://go.hummingbirdnetworks.com/next-gen-pen-test

We like the video that was done on this page, and in this style.  Can you make something like this?

The footage also needs to be color-corrected and audio balanced.
Needs royalty free music under the video.
You can take shots of this page in the video.
Use the animated logo at the end.
Video should be less than 3min according to the footage.

Here are the assets and editor's notes.
The assets have the raw footage and other assets you can use.

item.title: Adobe Premiere Pro YouTube Video Editor/Motion Graphics Project - Upwork
item.description:
The price indicated is per video. I need a total of exceeding/over 1000 videos. We will not talk about the budget, What I have indicated is final. The payments are made when the video is done, and am satisfied with the output.

**Bid only if you can provide a sample video with a given short audio. Approximately 2 minutes.**

I'm looking for a professional Premiere Pro video editor to work on my YouTube channel. The videos are typically short, 4K resolution, and last between 5-10 minutes.

This project needs a fast laptop or desktop for video editing using Adobe Premiere Pro.
I will provide a voice over for each video (Duration atmost 10 minutes), Then you will cut portions of stock videos to match the audio. You will also add images between the video portions when making the videos.
You'll need to add lower thirds to match the provided audio/voiceover.
You need to have 4K elements(Like transitions, Etc.) to create 4K Stunning videos.
Envato Elements access is an added advantage.

So basically this task is about creating short and unique video using provided audio, Creativity is highly encouraged. And it's a long term project which can last for two(2) years.

When bidding on this project you can attach some of the videos you have edited that uses the requirements above.

Key Requirements:
- Expertise in Adobe Premiere Pro: You should have extensive experience with the software to seamlessly edit and produce high-quality videos.
- Graphics and Animations: The videos require full graphics and animations. You should have a keen eye for design and be able to create visually appealing elements.

Ideal Skills:
- Video Editing: An in-depth understanding of video editing techniques and the ability to produce engaging content.
- Animation and Graphics: Experience in adding animations and graphics to videos, enhancing their visual appeal.
- YouTube Video Editing: Understanding of YouTube video standards and best practices is a plus.

Professionalism and reliability are essential. Please share any relevant portfolio or examples of your work in your proposal. Thank you!

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 25, 2024 22:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro
Country: Kenya
click to apply

item.title: Videographer To Film Social Media Content - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking to hire a videographer with or without experience in the US to film social media content

You must own a car or a bike to drive around the city

You must own you own gear and equipment like Camera, Lenses, Tripod, Microphone and Batteries

You will work 2 days a week per client, 3 hours each day

I will pay you $30usd an hour

And you will have 6 clients under your command

That means that when you get to the point where you have the 6 clients under your command, you'll be making $4,320/mo

In 6 months if you do your job properly, you can be eligible for a raise

That means you will go from $4,320/mo to $6,000/mo

We are going to be working initially with Kitchens Remodeling Companies, Bathroom Remodeling Companies and Construction Companies    

Your job is to go to the place they're working and in the first 2 hours you and the client are going to film the "A-Roll" of the videos.

You have to film 50 clips for B-roll. 5 seconds each.

And the B-Roll you film must include camera movement

For example

Tracking
Lets say shots going from right to left
Following the workers doing the job over there

And 2 or 3 styles more, Pretty easy

If you don't have experience, the minimum knowledge that you must have to qualify for this application is:

Know how a camera works  
Know how to shoot videos in a camera
Know how to do camera movements
And have a car or bike to drive or ride around the city

Budget: $4,320
Posted On: June 25, 2024 21:58 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, Videography, Camera
Skills: Business, Videography, Camera
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create Engaging 20-Minute E-Bike Review Video - Upwork
item.description:
Creative Brief for E-Bike Review Video Editing

Project Overview:
We are producing an e-bike review video as a proof of concept for a series of future videos. This project will showcase the SnapCycle Stinger e-bike and set the standard for subsequent reviews.

Objectives:

Deliver a high-quality, engaging 20-minute e-bike review video.
Ensure the video aligns with the provided template in style and pacing.
Successfully incorporate all provided content and custom graphics.

Target Audience:

E-bike enthusiasts.
Potential buyers interested in the SnapCycle Stinger.
Viewers seeking in-depth, visually appealing e-bike reviews.
Responsibilities:

Research and gather information about the e-bike.
Write a script for the review video.
Shoot and edit the video, ensuring high production value.
Incorporate graphics, animations, and visuals to enhance the viewer experience.
Add background music and sound effects to make the video engaging.

Skills Required:

Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Strong storytelling and scriptwriting abilities.
Knowledge of e-bikes and their technical aspects.
Attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work within deadlines.

Key Deliverables:

A fully edited 4K video.
Custom graphics that enhance the review.
Proper syncing of voiceovers with video content.
Selection and reframing of the best footage from all provided content and B-roll.

Materials Provided:

Insta360 video files (large size).
Completed voiceover files.
Video timeline.
An 80% complete template video as a reference.
Timeline:

Day 0: Project kickoff, transfer of all files.
Day 4: First draft submission.
Day 5-6: Revisions based on feedback; revised draft submission by end of Day 6.
Day 7: Final review and adjustments.
Day 8: Final 4K video delivery and transfer of all project files.
Day 9-10: Buffer for any last-minute changes or delays.
Deadlines and Penalties:

Adherence to deadlines is crucial.
Missing a deadline results in a $10 reduction in project cost for each occurrence.
Budget:

Total payment for this project is $75.
Payment will be adjusted according to any penalties incurred.
Future Opportunities:

Successful completion of this video may lead to editing 10 more 20-minute videos and 7 10-minute videos.
Success Criteria:

High-quality final video in 4K resolution.
Effective use of provided content and custom graphics.
Positive feedback and minimal revisions required.
Additional Notes:

This video will set the standard for a series; high-quality work and adherence to deadlines are vital.
Clear and regular communication throughout the project is expected.
Project Duration:

Medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.
Seeking an intermediate-level expert who can create a visually appealing and engaging e-bike review video that captivates viewers.


Budget: $80
Posted On: June 25, 2024 21:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:360-Degree Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Testimonial Video, Color Grading, Dialogue Editing, Dynamic Transition, Highlighting Effects, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Explainer Video, English, 360-Degree Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: 360-Degree Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Testimonial Video, Color Grading, Dialogue Editing, Dynamic Transition, Highlighting Effects, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Explainer Video, English, 360-Degree Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States

item.ns0:encoded:
Creative Brief for E-Bike Review Video Editing

Project Overview:
We are producing an e-bike review video as a proof of concept for a series of future videos. This project will showcase the SnapCycle Stinger e-bike and set the standard for subsequent reviews.

Objectives:

Deliver a high-quality, engaging 20-minute e-bike review video.
Ensure the video aligns with the provided template in style and pacing.
Successfully incorporate all provided content and custom graphics.

Target Audience:

E-bike enthusiasts.
Potential buyers interested in the SnapCycle Stinger.
Viewers seeking in-depth, visually appealing e-bike reviews.
Responsibilities:

Research and gather information about the e-bike.
Write a script for the review video.
Shoot and edit the video, ensuring high production value.
Incorporate graphics, animations, and visuals to enhance the viewer experience.
Add background music and sound effects to make the video engaging.

Skills Required:

Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Strong storytelling and scriptwriting abilities.
Knowledge of e-bikes and their technical aspects.
Attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work within deadlines.

Key Deliverables:

A fully edited 4K video.
Custom graphics that enhance the review.
Proper syncing of voiceovers with video content.
Selection and reframing of the best footage from all provided content and B-roll.

Materials Provided:

Insta360 video files (large size).
Completed voiceover files.
Video timeline.
An 80% complete template video as a reference.
Timeline:

Day 0: Project kickoff, transfer of all files.
Day 4: First draft submission.
Day 5-6: Revisions based on feedback; revised draft submission by end of Day 6.
Day 7: Final review and adjustments.
Day 8: Final 4K video delivery and transfer of all project files.
Day 9-10: Buffer for any last-minute changes or delays.
Deadlines and Penalties:

Adherence to deadlines is crucial.
Missing a deadline results in a $10 reduction in project cost for each occurrence.
Budget:

Total payment for this project is $75.
Payment will be adjusted according to any penalties incurred.
Future Opportunities:

Successful completion of this video may lead to editing 10 more 20-minute videos and 7 10-minute videos.
Success Criteria:

High-quality final video in 4K resolution.
Effective use of provided content and custom graphics.
Positive feedback and minimal revisions required.
Additional Notes:

This video will set the standard for a series; high-quality work and adherence to deadlines are vital.
Clear and regular communication throughout the project is expected.
Project Duration:

Medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.
Seeking an intermediate-level expert who can create a visually appealing and engaging e-bike review video that captivates viewers.


Budget: $80
Posted On: June 25, 2024 21:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:360-Degree Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Testimonial Video, Color Grading, Dialogue Editing, Dynamic Transition, Highlighting Effects, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Explainer Video, English, 360-Degree Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing

item.title: Job Opportunity: Video Editor (E-commerce Dropshipping Ads) - Upwork
item.description:
About Us:

We are a dynamic e-commerce company specialising in dropshipping, dedicated to providing innovative products to our local customer base. Our mission is to deliver exceptional experiences through captivating advertisements that drive engagement and conversions.

Position Overview:

We are seeking a skilled Video Editors with expertise in creating high-converting advertisements for e-commerce dropshipping. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of optimising ad performance by lowering CPMs (Cost Per Mille) and increasing Click Through Rates (CTR) through strategic split testing of video ad variations.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with the marketing team to develop compelling video ad concepts aligned with our brand and target audience.
Edit and produce engaging video ads optimised for various platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok.

Implement split testing strategies to experiment with different ad variations and determine optimal configurations.

Continuously iterate on ad creatives based on performance data to maximize ROI and achieve business objectives.

Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in e-commerce advertising to maintain competitive advantage.

Qualifications:

Proven experience as a Video Editor, with a portfolio showcasing successful e-commerce ad campaigns if possible.

Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or equivalent.

Strong understanding of e-commerce advertising platforms and metrics, including CPM, CTR, and ROAS (Return on Ad Spend).

Ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions to optimise ad performance.

Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.

Detail-oriented mindset with a passion for creating visually stunning and impactful content.

Benefits:

Opportunity for competitive salary commensurate with experience.

Opportunity to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment with a talented and passionate team.

Room for professional growth and advancement within the company.

Flexible work arrangements and a supportive company culture.

How to Apply:

If you are a creative and analytical Video Editor looking to make a meaningful impact in the world of e-commerce advertising, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you are interested in this position within the headline please put in the headline "Video Editing Interest".

Note: This position is open to candidates able to work remotely.


Posted On: June 25, 2024 21:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Instagram Reels, Social Media Video, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Testimonial Video, Instagram Reels, Social Media Video, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: Australia

item.title: Video editing for social media Hiring this week - Upwork
item.description:
We are a rapidly growing eCommerce agency building brands that sell physical products

Our team is international and 100% remote.

We want someone to edit videos based on instructions, try different hooks and ideas implement new things when asked, using different kind of effects and zooms for engaging videos, and has an eye for details and imperfections, videos will be provided or asked to be outsourced, the final edited videos will be used as ads or posts for TikTok, Instagram and Facebook

-Intermediate skills on premiere pro
-Editing skills are a requirement
-Creativity and artistic mindset
-Strong knowledge of video storytelling
-English speaking
-attention for details
-suggest new ideas are a big plus, especially if implemented.
-Organization and time management abilities

We understand visuals are just a part of the equation (though significant). We understand the importance of feedback loops, and thus we consider this relationship to be rather iterative.

Plus bonuses based on performance

Hourly Range: $7.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 21:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial

item.description:
We seek a talented and creative video producer to create 'who we are' video(s) for our website. The videos will utilize the information from our website and can include voiceovers from our Ex. Dir.  This would be all remote work and utilize b roll that we have or the producer has access to.  As a video producer, we expect you to work with us to design and create something eye-catching and engaging within our small budget. - Video production

- Creative thinking

item.title: Turn a long-form YouTube video into short form TikTok Clips - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Video Editor for Short-Form Clips

Description:

Hey there! I'm looking for a skilled video editor to transform a long-form YouTube video into multiple engaging short-form clips. Here’s what you’ll need to do:

Watch the provided long-form YouTube video (around 20 minutes or longer).
Identify and extract multiple engaging and high-quality clips.
Use your expertise to ensure the clips are visually appealing and engaging.
I can provide timestamps to help guide you, but your keen eye for standout moments would be better

Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing, specifically creating short-form content from longer videos.
Ability to identify compelling content and create engaging clips.
Proficiency with video editing software.
Attention to detail and a good sense of pacing and storytelling.
Ability to meet deadlines and work efficiently.
If this sounds like something you can do, I’d love to hear from you!

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 25, 2024 21:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, TikTok Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, TikTok Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Full-Time Virtual Assistant for Social Media Content Creation using AI Tools - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an exceptional Virtual Assistant with a strong background in social media content creation, specifically TikTok and Instagram Reels. The ideal candidate will be proficient in using AI tools such as ChatGPT, ElevenLabs, and others, to enhance our social media presence. Additionally, expertise in Canva and CapCut is required, along with a keen understanding of trending audios and content.

Key Responsibilities:

Create and manage engaging content for TikTok and Instagram Reels.
Utilize AI tools like ChatGPT and ElevenLabs to generate content ideas and scripts.
Design eye-catching graphics and videos using Canva and CapCut.
Stay up-to-date with trending audios and integrate them into content creation.
Watch and implement learnings from additional courses to continuously improve our social media pages.
Analyze performance metrics to optimize content strategies.
Collaborate with the team to align social media efforts with overall marketing goals.
Qualifications:

Proven experience in creating content for TikTok and Instagram Reels.
Exceptional skills in using AI tools such as ChatGPT and ElevenLabs.
Proficient in Canva and CapCut for graphic design and video editing.
Strong understanding of trending audios and social media trends.
Ability to watch and implement insights from additional training courses.
Excellent communication and organizational skills.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience working with other AI tools for content creation.
Knowledge of social media analytics and performance tracking.
Prior experience as a Virtual Assistant or similar role.
Working Hours:

Must be available to work during US time zones or at least mostly during US time zones.
How to Apply:
Please submit your resume, a cover letter detailing your experience with social media content creation and AI tools, and examples of your work on TikTok and Instagram Reels.

Additionally, review the following two Instagram pages that we’ve already created:

Instagram Page 1 : https://www.instagram.com/thenewthoughtrevolution/
Instagram Page 2: https://www.instagram.com/manifestmoneymindsett/
Come back with some ideas on how we could potentially improve the pages to get more followers and views.

Additional Information:

This is a full-time position.
We are looking to hire immediately and prefer candidates who can start as soon as possible.
The position will be compensated on a fixed monthly rate.
We look forward to receiving your application and working together to enhance our social media presence!

Budget: $550
Posted On: June 25, 2024 21:21 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Canva, CapCut, Social Media Marketing, TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, Graphic Design
Skills: Canva, CapCut, Social Media Marketing, TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Ecommerce Video Sales Letters - [Long-Term Work] - Upwork
item.description:
Are you fantastic at creating high converting VSLs?

Then this could be the perfect job for you!

I'm looking for a video editor who can dedicate at least 10-20 hours per week (possibly up to 40 hours) to creating VSLs for my Ecommerce Brand.

The videos will be from 30 seconds to 10 minutes long, and are in the health / wellness / apparel niche.

The ads will be used for Facebook ads.

Compensation is highly dependent on skill level. You can expect a rate between $7-$15 per hour.

I have a simple brief prepared for a short VSL. This will be used to test out your skills.

Please answer the questions below with a LOOM video or similar.

1. Have you ever created VSLs for Facebook before?
2. How many hours per week are you available?
3. What was your last job/project? How did it end?
4. What are your career goals?
5. Do you have any other relevent skills?
6. Please attach an example of your work!

Again - please submit a loom video of you answering these questions. ONLY applicants who respond with a video or audio recording will be considered.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 21:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Testimonial Video
Skills: Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Testimonial Video
Country: United States
click to apply

The ads will be used for Facebook ads.

Compensation is highly dependent on skill level. You can expect a rate between $7-$15 per hour.

I have a simple brief prepared for a short VSL. This will be used to test out your skills.

Please answer the questions below with a LOOM video or similar.

1. Have you ever created VSLs for Facebook before?
2. How many hours per week are you available?
3. What was your last job/project? How did it end?
4. What are your career goals?
5. Do you have any other relevent skills?
6. Please attach an example of your work!

Again - please submit a loom video of you answering these questions. ONLY applicants who respond with a video or audio recording will be considered.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 21:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Testimonial Video
Skills: Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Testimonial Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Instagram/facebook reels editing - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a creative and skilled Video Editor to join our team. Your primary role will be editing reels and short videos for social media platforms.

Responsibilities:

    Edit short videos and reels to produce engaging and high-quality content.
    Add effects, transitions, and sound to enhance the final product.
    Collaborate with our content team to understand the vision and goals for each project.
    Ensure all videos meet brand guidelines and are delivered on time.

Requirements:

    Proven experience in video editing, especially for social media.
    Proficiency in editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
    Strong sense of timing and storytelling.
    Ability to work under tight deadlines.

PS: Dont be afraid if u are a beginner .

for example video : https://www.instagram.com/p/C8mZwZpoUP9/

Hourly Range: $5.00-$11.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 21:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Dialogue Editing, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Audition, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation
Skills: Dialogue Editing, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Audition, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation
Country: Poland
click to apply
